website_summaries.verdict: Immune support in a bio-active colloidal silver solution that can be used by anyone over 2-years old, as well as pets.
pros: Colloidal silver in ozonated water for a "super-oxygenated" formula
No sweeteners, colorings, stabilizers, or additives
1 bottle is about 48 servings or doses
Helps support immune health, as well as other ailments such as nerve health, viral infections, and funguses
cons: Some users saw a quality difference from previous bottles

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing! I took it for early stages of MASTITIS ...

customer_reviews.title: Great for cavities.
customer_reviews.text: Through research I've come across information regarding Colloidal Silver and cavity prevention. Growing up I was a candy fanatic which lead to the developed of severe cavities, plaque and tooth aches due to not brushing consistently. I am considering removing my silver filling, because of the mercury toxicity that's associated with it. I can honestly say that this is helping me prevent future cavities and re-mineralize my teeth; after rinsing with this my mouth feels moisturized and fresh. I definitely recommend this along with a mineral tooth paste to those who are suffering with cavities and sensitivity.

I start using this as a nose spray at the first symptom of infection and it has kept me from getting a full blown infection that requires anti-biotics or the surgery the ENTs recommended. I prefer using the clear ionic silver but I couldn't pass up this great price on Amazon. Both work fine for me. This is a fraction of the cost ounce per ounce at the health food store. EDIT: spelling correction in title

customer_reviews.title: Unsure about this product & it's effectiveness

However when I received it the smell and taste was very different. I also use this product to keep my acne at bay, when I applied it my face didn't feel the same cleanliness as before. My face began to break out again. I was disappointed and believe that this May have to do with the way it's stored or it may have been tampered with. Will not be purchasing from them again. My advice is to pay the extra bucks and buy from your trusty local store.

After doing Even More research I have learned the clear colloidal is good for topical use & less effective to ingest than the amber.

I take it by the teaspoon like you would a cough syrup. Looks like water and has very little taste. Follow directions. Two teaspoons a day should do the trick. Like any other antibiotic take for 2 weeks max then stop.

I am continuing to take it, but only once a day instead of three times. I am very happy that I tried this.

I can feel that it does so because when I decide to quit taking it........I feel a whole body change within me when it's gone. It's hard to explain but it's real each time I stop. No colds when I take this, and haven't had a flu in years. God willing it continues to work this well as long as it's available. I know everyone body's is different, but I hope if you try it, it works for you as well as it does for me.

We use it on all our animals, horses included, also. Highly recommend.

product_meta.title: Trace Minerals Research Vegan Colloidal Silver, Bio-Active Silver Hydrosol Liquid Mineral Supplement, Natural & Pure, 30 PPM, 8 fl. Oz
product_meta.description: Trace Minerals Colloidal Silver is a dietary supplement with over 30 ppm per dose of pure colloidal Silver. Trace Minerals Research use special and proprietary technology to process this high quality Colloidal Silver. With each bottle, you can expect a wide range of nutritional benefits.
feature_bullets: SUPER-OXYGENATED PURE COLLOIDAL SILVER - Trace Minerals Research Colloidal Silver contains pure bio-active colloidal silver and ozonated distilled water ONLY - no additives, coloring or stabilizers - so you can be sure that it will work and make a difference in your health!
CERTIFIED VEGAN BY THE AMERICAN VEGETARIAN ASSOCIATION - Our Silver Hydrosol contains no animal or animal byproducts, only pure bioactive colloidal silver nano solution.
THE PERFECT CONCENTRATION AND PARTICLE SIZE - At over 30PPM, it’s the perfect dose for safe and effective absorption by the body.

EFFECTIVE FOR ALMOST EVERYONE - This advanced colloidal-silver is great for everyone, men or women, and kids above 2 years old. You can also use it to treat infections in dogs and cats and other pets.

TRACE MINERALS RESEARCH GUARANTEE - If for any reason you you are not happy with your purchased supplements from any of our verified sellers, please contact our customer support and we’ll make it right for you!
